Articles.Content:
It sounds silly and pointless but consider the following.

You're working in a big mission save and have all sorts of GSE you use often but aren't using right now. There are 500 parts not currently in use that you could eliminate from the scene by recovering the vessel, but you're like me and love keeping vessels in service until they are unusable rather than mission-by-mission gameplay. You're left with a neat slideshow of all your creations.

Now consider Distant Vessel Rendering from Distant Object Enhancement. It will give a visual, physicsless version of your target (or all visible crafts). What if you could apply that same 'mask' and toggle a vessel 'off' essentially unloading it from the scene but for the visual physicsless version.

I'm only a veteran mod user so I'm curious. Is there a way to create a mod that does this?
